titles.title: A resolution honoring the life and service of David Dorn and expressing condolences to the family of David Dorn.
A resolution honoring the life and service of David Dorn and expressing condolences to the family of David Dorn.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution (1) extends condolences to the family and friends of David Dorn, (2) recognizes and honors David Dorn as a hero who lived a life of service to his community and others through the pursuit of justice and the protection of individuals in the community, and (3) expresses deep respect and appreciation for the selfless character and sacrifice of David Dorn.
